definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: The Mossad has a record of taking startling risks.
sentences.chinese: 摩薩德曾有擔負令人震驚的風險作案的先例。

sentences.english: The Mossad, Israel’s secret agency, claimed full credit for catching him, in Argentina.
sentences.chinese: 他之前，被以色列特工機關摩薩德在阿根廷抓獲。

sentences.english: There was no evidence that the group had Mossad links, he added.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲沒有證據證明上述人員與摩薩德有聯繫。
